alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 13 at 6:12AM EST until January 13 at 3:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to 2 1/2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield and Southern New Haven Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 3 PM EST this afternoon. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Widespread moderate flooding of vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline this morning, with 2 to 2 1/2 feet of inundation above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. This will result in numerous road closures and cause widespread flooding of low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns and homes/businesses with basements near the waterfront. Vehicles parked in vulnerable areas near the waterfront would likely become flooded. Flooding will also extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Breaking waves of 2 to 3 feet during the morning high tide will result in beach erosion, as well as wave splashover onto shoreline roads and properties. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/12 PM 10.9/11.4 3.1/ 3.6 2.5/ 3.0 3 MODERATE 14/01 AM 7.1/ 7.6 -0.8/-0.2 -1.0/-0.5 4 NONE 14/01 PM 8.3/ 8.8 0.5/ 1.0 0.1/ 0.6 3 NONE 15/02 AM 7.3/ 7.8 -0.6/-0.1 -1.0/-0.5 2 NONE 15/02 PM 8.1/ 8.6 0.2/ 0.8 0.2/ 0.8 1 NONE 16/03 AM 8.5/ 9.0 0.7/ 1.1 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 8.7 FT, MODERATE 10.2 FT, MAJOR 11.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.4 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/12 PM 9.9/10.4 2.6/ 3.1 2.2/ 2.7 1 MIN/MOD 14/01 AM 6.0/ 6.5 -1.4/-0.9 -1.0/-0.5 1 NONE 14/01 PM 7.5/ 8.0 0.2/ 0.7 0.0/ 0.5 1 NONE 15/02 AM 6.2/ 6.7 -1.1/-0.7 -1.0/-0.5 1 NONE 15/02 PM 7.4/ 7.9 0.1/ 0.6 0.2/ 0.7 0 NONE 16/03 AM 7.5/ 8.0 0.2/ 0.7 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE NEW HAVEN HARBOR AT NEW HAVEN CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 8.7 FT, MODERATE 9.3 FT, MAJOR 10.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 2.6 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/12 PM 9.4/ 9.9 2.7/ 3.2 2.2/ 2.7 3 MODERATE 14/01 AM 5.6/ 6.1 -1.1/-0.7 -0.9/-0.4 4 NONE 14/01 PM 7.0/ 7.5 0.2/ 0.8 0.0/ 0.5 3 NONE 15/02 AM 5.6/ 6.1 -1.1/-0.7 -1.1/-0.6 2 NONE 15/02 PM 6.9/ 7.4 0.2/ 0.7 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE 16/03 AM 6.9/ 7.4 0.2/ 0.7 0.2/ 0.8 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
